contextual_notes: The user was focused on ensuring safety for an elderly family member, which influenced their satisfaction with specific safety-related advice.
The user seemed to value actionable and practical suggestions, as seen in their responses to advice on hiring contractors and getting quotes.
general_insights: Providing specific, actionable advice can significantly enhance user satisfaction, especially when addressing safety concerns.
Maintaining a supportive and reassuring tone throughout the conversation can lead to higher satisfaction levels.
Offering a strong closing with summaries or additional resources can help maintain user engagement until the end of the interaction.
